== Ancharakandy (CT) (627242) ==

Ancharakandy (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 15.45 sq. km. and harbouring 5245 households with total population of 23030 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 515 km. Male population is 10646 and female population is 12384. Scheduled Caste population is 370 and Scheduled Tribes population is 72. Census Location Code of the town is 627242<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 72 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 16 km.
